name: Grapelo
description:
GRAPELO is a speedrun game, where the player must collect different objects in the shortest possible time (it is optional, the level can be finished at any time, the time is for people who want to show their gamer skills) to finish the level. 

This game was made by me(Jagond).

I am a beginner in programming in unity, this game is among the first projects I have done so far and I decided to post it to get an impression or review about the game and what I could have added to it to make it make it more interesting.
